triples.name: Reinforcement learning
triples.relevance: The paper addresses challenges in deep RL algorithms and proposes an improved approach for training multiple tasks with shared representations.

triples.name: Multi-task learning
triples.relevance: The paper builds upon multi-task learning concepts to train multiple tasks simultaneously while sharing a common policy.

triples.name: Transfer learning
triples.relevance: The paper proposes Distral as a novel transfer learning approach that uses policy distillation to improve transfer across related tasks.

triples.name: Deep learning
triples.relevance: The paper addresses challenges in deep RL algorithms and uses neural networks for policy learning.

triples.name: Neural network (machine learning)
triples.relevance: The paper uses shared neural network parameters as a foundation for the multitask learning architecture.

triples.name: Knowledge distillation
triples.relevance: The paper proposes using policy distillation to maintain a shared policy that represents the centroid of all task policies.

triples.name: Gradient descent
triples.relevance: The paper addresses issues with gradient interference between tasks during training with gradient-based optimization.
